## cilium bpf nat flush

Flush all NAT mapping entries

```
cilium bpf nat flush [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for flush
```

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
```
